    • PointsBoardController

      public PointsBoardController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes this element, preparing it for later use.

    • addPegInSlot

      public void addPegInSlot(int slot, PlayerColor color)
      Adds a peg in a point slot.
      Parameters:
      slot - The slot in which the peg should be added.
      color - The color of the peg to add. If a peg is already in that slow, a multicolored peg will be created.

    • removePegInSlot

      public void removePegInSlot(int slot, PlayerColor playerColor)
      Removes a peg from a slot.
      Parameters:
      slot - The slot from which the peg should be removed.
      playerColor - The color of the peg to remove. If other pegs are in the slot, only one color will be removed.

    • putPegInSlot

      private void putPegInSlot(int slot, PegController peg)
      Actually puts a peg in a slot.
      Parameters:
      slot - The slot.
      peg - The peg element.

    • getRoot

      public javafx.scene.Parent getRoot()
      Returns:
      The root node of this points board.
